memory.description: Comprehensive memory management - search, create, update, delete, list memories

action.description: The action to perform: search, create, update, delete, list, or get

category.description: Category filter for search or category for new memory

topic_id.description: Topic ID filter for search or topic assignment

memory_id.description: Memory ID for get, update, or delete actions

memory.description: Memory text content for create or update actions

created_after.description: ISO timestamp - return memories created after this time

created_before.description: ISO timestamp - return memories created before this time

limit.description: Maximum number of results for list/search (default: 10)

offset.description: Offset for pagination in list action (default: 0)

memories.description: Array of compact memory strings in format: id|timestamp|memory_text

github_issue.description: Manage GitHub issues - create, view, comment, close, list issues and comments

action.description: The action to perform on GitHub issues

issue_id.description: Issue ID for view, comment, close, list_comments actions

body.description: Issue body content for create action

manage_prompt.description: Manage agent's system prompts - add, delete, or list prompt entries (internal use only)

action.description: Action to perform: add, delete, or list

prompt_id.description: ID of the prompt to delete (required for delete action)

prompt_text.description: Text content of the prompt (required for add action)

reasoning.description: Reasoning for the prompt change (required for add action)

prompts.description: Array of compact prompt strings in format: id|prompt_text

email.description: Create email drafts via Gmail (creates drafts for safety, never sends directly)

action.description: The action to perform (only 'send' supported, creates draft for safety)

calendar.description: Calendar operations - create, search, get upcoming, delete, and list events via Google Calendar

action.description: The action to perform: create_event, search_events, get_upcoming, delete_event, or list_events

start_datetime.description: Event start time in ISO 8601 format (required for create_event)

end_datetime.description: Event end time in ISO 8601 format (required for create_event)

attendees.description: List of attendee email addresses (optional for create_event)

send_notifications.description: Whether to send notifications to attendees (optional, default: true)

transparency.description: Event transparency - opaque or transparent (optional for create_event)

visibility.description: Event visibility - default, public, private, or confidential (optional for create_event)

start_date.description: Start date in YYYY-MM-DD format (optional for search_events, required for list_events)

end_date.description: End date in YYYY-MM-DD format (optional for search_events, required for list_events)

max_results.description: Maximum number of results to return (optional, default varies by action)

days_ahead.description: Number of days ahead to look for upcoming events (optional for get_upcoming, default: 7)

contacts.description: Manage Google Contacts - get, list, search, create, update, and delete contacts

email.description: Email address or contact identifier (required for get_contact)

query.description: Search query for matching contacts (required for search_contacts)

max_results.description: Maximum number of results to return (optional for search_contacts)

contact_identifier.description: Contact identifier - email, name, or ID (required for update_contact, delete_contact)

display_name.description: Full display name for the contact (optional for create/update)

email_addresses.description: Array of email addresses (optional for create/update)

phone_numbers.description: Array of phone numbers (optional for create/update)

notes.description: Notes or biography for the contact (optional for create/update)

stickynotes.description: Default task list operations - create, list, update, complete, and delete tasks with recurring support via Google Tasks

action.description: The action to perform: list, create, update, complete, or delete

task_id.description: Task ID (required for update, complete, delete actions)

title.description: Task title (required for create, optional for update)

due.description: Due date/time in YYYY-MM-DD or YYYY-MM-DD HH:MM format (optional for create/update)

rrule.description: RFC 5545 RRULE for recurring tasks, e.g. 'FREQ=DAILY;INTERVAL=1' (optional for create/update)

tasks.description: Array of formatted task strings with ID, title, status, due date, and notes

lists.description: Simple list management - create, delete lists and manage items within specific lists

action.description: The action to perform on lists or items within lists

list_id.description: List ID (required for delete_list, list_items, add_item, remove_item actions)

returns.description: Array of strings in format 'id|title' or single string for create/delete operations

smarthome.description: Smart home device control and automation via natural language requests. Handles device discovery, action generation, and execution through Home Assistant. Supports lighting control, media recommendations, and general device automation.

user_request.description: The full text request from the user describing what they want to do with smart home devices

device.description: The name of the specific device, if applicable (optional)

status.description: Status of the operation (success, error, etc.)

message.description: Human-readable message about the operation result

reasoning.description: Explanation of what was done and why

actions.description: List of Home Assistant actions that were executed

device_ids.description: Device IDs involved in the operation
